Quality Education.reason: The course is explicitly designed to provide foundational professional knowledge, enhance abstract thinking, and build a basis for higher-level courses, which are core aspects of quality education.
evidence: 奠定相關基礎專業知識(Students will acquire and apply expertise in their respective fields.)
提升學生的數學抽象思維、數學證明邏輯推理能力、解決問題的能力。
為未來更高階的數理統計課程或應用建立基礎。

Decent Work and Economic Growth.reason: The course develops foundational knowledge and problem-solving skills applicable to data analysis, which are valuable for professional work and contribute to economic capacity.
